mapper.select: SELECT r.RSVNID, r.USERID, r.WASHTYPE, r.WASHID, r.STAFFID, r.REQUESTID, TO_CHAR(r.RSVNDATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS FMTRSVNDATE, r.RSVNTIME, r.CARTYPECOST, r.STATUS, r.CANCELYN, r.CRTDATE, u.USERNAME, cw.WASHNAME FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN CARWASHES cw ON r.WASHID = cw.WASHID LEFT JOIN STAFF s ON r.STAFFID = s.STAFFID LEFT JOIN USERS u ON s.USERID = u.USERID WHERE r.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY r.RSVNID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATIONS SET STATUS = '예약취소', CANCELYN = 'Y' WHERE RSVNID = #{rsvnId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS ( USERID, WASHTYPE, WASHID, RSVNDATE, RSVNTIME, CARTYPECOST) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{washType}, #{washId}, #{rsvnDate}, #{rsvnTime}, #{carTypeCost} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.RSVNID, CASE WHEN COUNT(rv.RWID) > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS isReviewed FROM RESERVATIONS r LEFT JOIN REVIEWS rv ON r.RSVNID = rv.RSVNID2 AND rv.USERID = #{userId} -- ✅ RSVNID2 기준으로 변경 WHERE r.USERID = #{userId} GROUP BY r.RSVNID

SELECT r.RSVNID, r.USERID, r.WASHTYPE, r.WASHID, r.STAFFID, r.REQUESTID, r.RSVNDATE, TO_CHAR(r.RSVNDATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS FMTRSVNDATE, r.RSVNTIME, r.CARTYPECOST, r.STATUS, r.CANCELYN, r.CRTDATE, u.USERNAME, cw.WASHNAME FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN CARWASHES cw ON r.WASHID = cw.WASHID LEFT JOIN STAFF s ON r.STAFFID = s.STAFFID LEFT JOIN USERS u ON s.USERID = u.USERID WHERE cw.USERID = #{ownerId} ORDER BY r.RSVNDATE DESC, r.RSVNTIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATIONS SET STATUS = #{status}, CANCELYN = CASE WHEN #{status} = '예약취소' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHERE RSVNID = #{rsvnId}
